tooltip.title: Hue Selection Range
tooltip.content: Changes the hue range you can select from the hue slider

tooltip.title: Hue
tooltip.content: Changes the selected hue

tooltip.title: RGB Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the RGB value of the hue here

tooltip.title: Hue Slider
tooltip.content: Use this to select a hue graphically

tooltip.title: Saturation
tooltip.content: Changes the selected saturation

tooltip.title: Saturation Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the percentage of saturation here

tooltip.title: Saturation Slider
tooltip.content: Use this to select a saturation graphically

tooltip.title: Lightness
tooltip.content: Changes the selected lightness

tooltip.title: Lightness Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the percentage of lightness here

tooltip.title: Lightness Slider
tooltip.content: Use this to select a lightness graphically

tooltip.title: Alpha
tooltip.content: Changes the selected alpha value

tooltip.title: Alpha Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the percentage of alpha here

tooltip.title: Alpha Slider
tooltip.content: Use this to select a alpha value graphically

tooltip.title: Color Picker
tooltip.content: Click and drag to select a color

tooltip.title: Color Preview + Menu
tooltip.content: Click to bring up a menu to add color to library *note: you cannot modify default presets*

tooltip.title: Eyedropper
tooltip.content: Click to start eyedropper mode. Right-click or press ESC to exit the eyedropper mode.

tooltip.title: RGB Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the RGB value of the hue here

tooltip.title: Hex Value Entry
tooltip.content: You can enter in the Hex code of the color here

tooltip.title: Location
tooltip.content: Edit this to change the currently selected hue key's position[0-100%]

tooltip.title: Preset
tooltip.content: Click to select, right-click->Remove to delete

tooltip.title: Finish library creation
tooltip.content: click to finish library creation *does NOT save to disk*

tooltip.title: Library name
tooltip.content: Enter new library's name here.

tooltip.title: Preset name
tooltip.content: Enter new preset's name here.

tooltip.title: Preset Menu
tooltip.content: Click to get a menu for managing presets

tooltip.title: Add Preset
tooltip.content: Click to add preset to library *note: you cannot modify default presets*

tooltip.title: Play/Pause
tooltip.content: toggles play/pause state of particle preview

tooltip.title: Loop
tooltip.content: toggles whether or not the preview should loop playback

tooltip.title: Play speed
tooltip.content: adjusts the playback speed of the preview

tooltip.title: Playback time
tooltip.content: shows current playback time in relation to total lifetime of emitter.

tooltip.title: Time Scale
tooltip.content: adjusts the playback speed of the preview

tooltip.title: Number of particles in emitter
tooltip.content: Displays the current number of particles in the emitter

tooltip.title: Current playback time
tooltip.content: shows current playback time

tooltip.title: Camera dropdown
tooltip.content: shows menu with a few options on what should be displayed with preview

tooltip.title: Reset playback
tooltip.content: Resets emitter playback

tooltip.title: Display wireframe
tooltip.content: Toggles the wireframe view of the emitter

tooltip.title: Focus
tooltip.content: Click to zoom extents to frame bounding box of selected emitter.

tooltip.title: Enable Time Of Day
tooltip.content: Toggles time of day render option.

tooltip.title: Step forward
tooltip.content: Steps playback forward

tooltip.title: Comment
tooltip.content: Insert a comment into the emitter.

tooltip.title: Enabled
tooltip.content: Set false to disable this effect

tooltip.title: Inheritance
tooltip.content: Source of ParticleParams used as base for this effect (for serialization, display, etc)

tooltip.title: Spawn Indirection
tooltip.content: Direct: spawn from emitter location; else spawn from each particle in parent emitter

tooltip.title: Count
tooltip.content: Number of particles alive at once

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Beam Count
tooltip.content: Number of beams alive at once

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Beam Lifetime
tooltip.content: Beam lifetime in seconds

tooltip.title: Target Position
tooltip.content: Beam target offset from origin

tooltip.title: Random Target Offset
tooltip.content: Randomizes the beam target offset from origin

tooltip.title: Segment Type
tooltip.content: Fixed: Sets the number of segments. Length: Sets the length of each segment

tooltip.title: Segment Count
tooltip.content: Defines the number of segments with Fixed segment type set.

tooltip.title: Segment Length
tooltip.content: Defines the length of each segment with Length segment type set

tooltip.title: Texture Shift
tooltip.content: Shifts the texture in the V direction at the specified rate

tooltip.title: Up Vector for Waves
tooltip.content: XYZ vector for which the waveform will occur on

tooltip.title: Wave Form Source
tooltip.content: Sets the source side of the beam

tooltip.title: Wave Form Type
tooltip.content: Sets the behavior of the waveform

tooltip.title: Wave Phase
tooltip.content: Positions the wave form along the source. Use curve to animate

tooltip.title: Wave Amplitude
tooltip.content: Strength of wave deformation

tooltip.title: Wave Frequency
tooltip.content: Multiplier for number of wave cycles

tooltip.title: Emitter Size
tooltip.content: Size of emitter in meters

tooltip.title: Emitter Size
tooltip.content: Size of emitter in meters

tooltip.title: Spawn Offset
tooltip.content: Offset the spawning of particles spherically at a distance from the emitter origin in meters

tooltip.title: Confine X
tooltip.content: Particles only render inside the axis of the box

tooltip.title: Confine Y
tooltip.content: Particles only render inside the axis of the box

tooltip.title: Confine Z
tooltip.content: Particles only render inside the axis of the box

tooltip.title: Spawn Pos XYZ
tooltip.content: Spawn position away from the emitter itself, in emitter space

tooltip.title: Spawn Pos XYZ Random
tooltip.content: Randomize the spawn position away from the emitter itself, in emitter space

tooltip.title: Spawn Pos Increment XYZ
tooltip.content: Particles are spawned incrementally based on a percentage of emitter size

tooltip.title: Spawn Pos Increment XYZ Random
tooltip.content: Randomizes particles spawned incrementally based on a percentage of emitter size

tooltip.title: Velocity XYZ
tooltip.content: Sets the velocity of the particles based on the shape axis

tooltip.title: Velocity XYZ Random
tooltip.content: Randomizes the velocity of the particles based on the shape axis

tooltip.title: Velocity Spread
tooltip.content: Restricts the angle of spherical distribution in the direction of velocity

tooltip.title: Maintain Density
tooltip.content: Increase count when emitter moves to maintain spatial density

tooltip.title: Reduce Alpha
tooltip.content: Reduce alpha inversely to count increase

tooltip.title: Lock Anchor Points
tooltip.content: Locks the vertex anchor points

tooltip.title: Trail Fading
tooltip.content: The texture of the particle sprite that will show up ontop of trail particles that are orthagonal to the camera.

tooltip.title: Connection
tooltip.content: Particles are drawn connected serially

tooltip.title: Connect To Origin
tooltip.content: Newest particle connected to emitter origin

tooltip.title: Texture Mapping
tooltip.content: Basis of texture coord mapping (particle or stream)

tooltip.title: Texture Mirror
tooltip.content: Mirror alternating texture tiles; else wrap

tooltip.title: Texture Frequency
tooltip.content: Number of texture wraps per particle or sequence

tooltip.title: Continuous
tooltip.content: Emit particles gradually until Count reached (rate = Count / ParticleLifeTime)

tooltip.title: Spawn Delay
tooltip.content: Delay the emitter start time by this value

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Life Time
tooltip.content: Lifetime of the emitter, 0 if infinite. Always emits at least Count particles
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Timing.Continuous is unchecked.

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Pulse Period
tooltip.content: Time between auto-restarts of emitter; 0 if never

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Particle Life Time
tooltip.content: Lifetime of particles, 0 if indefinite (die with emitter)

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Remain While Visible
tooltip.content: Particles will only die when not rendered (by any viewport)

tooltip.title: Position Offset
tooltip.content: Spawn offset from the emitter position

tooltip.title: Random Offset
tooltip.content: Random offset of emission relative position to the spawn position

tooltip.title: Offset Roundness
tooltip.content: Fraction of emit volume corners to round: 0 = box, 1 = ellipsoid

tooltip.title: Offset Inner Fraction
tooltip.content: Fraction of inner emit volume to avoid

tooltip.title: Attach Type
tooltip.content: Component of parent geometry to use for attached entity

tooltip.title: Attach Form
tooltip.content: Aspect of parents emitters geometry to emit from

tooltip.title: Focus Angle
tooltip.content: Angle to vary focus from default (Z axis), for variation

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Focus Azimuth
tooltip.content: Angle to rotate focus about default, for variation. 0 = Z axis

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Focus Camera Dir
tooltip.content: Rotate emitter focus partially or fully to face camera

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Focus Gravity Direction
tooltip.content: Uses negative gravity dir, rather than emitter Y, as focus dir

tooltip.title: Focus Rotates Emitter
tooltip.content: Focus rotation is equivalent to emitter rotation; else affects just emission direction

tooltip.title: Emit Offset Dir
tooltip.content: Default emission direction parallel to emission offset from origin

tooltip.title: Emit Angle
tooltip.content: Angle from focus dir (emitter Y), in degrees. RandomVar determines min angle

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Facing
tooltip.content: Orientation of particle face

tooltip.title: Orient To Velocity
tooltip.content: Particle X axis aligned to velocity direction

tooltip.title: Curvature
tooltip.content: For Facing=Camera, fraction that normals are curved to a spherical shape

tooltip.title: Blend Type
tooltip.content: Blend rendering type

tooltip.title: Sorting_Method
tooltip.content: Sorting algorithm for GPU particles

tooltip.title: Sorting_Convergence
tooltip.content: Sort convergence per frame

tooltip.title: Browse
tooltip.content: Launches a file dialog to allow user to select an asset to use

tooltip.title: Open Asset Editor
tooltip.content: Launches an image editor to edit the assigned asset

tooltip.title: Assigns selected
tooltip.content: Assigns the selected item from the asset browser

tooltip.title: Texture Tiling
tooltip.content: Tiling of texture for animation and variation

tooltip.title: Tiles X
tooltip.content: Number of columns texture is split into

tooltip.title: Tiles Y
tooltip.content: Number of rows texture is split into

tooltip.title: First Tile
tooltip.content: First (or only) tile to use

tooltip.title: Variant Count
tooltip.content: Number of randomly selectable tiles; 0 or 1 if no variation

tooltip.title: Anim Frames Count
tooltip.content: Number of tiles (frames) of animation; 0 or 1 if no animation

tooltip.title: Anim Framerate
tooltip.content: Tex framerate; 0 = 1 cycle / particle life

tooltip.title: Anim Cycle
tooltip.content: How animation cycles

tooltip.title: Anim Blend
tooltip.content: Blend textures between frames

tooltip.title: Horizontal Flip Chance
tooltip.content: Chance each particle will flip in X direction

tooltip.title: Vertical Flip Chance
tooltip.content: Chance each particle will flip in Y direction

tooltip.title: Anim Curve
tooltip.content: Modifies the speed and direction of the animation

tooltip.title: Material
tooltip.content: Material (overrides texture)

tooltip.title: Browse
tooltip.content: Launches a file dialog to allow user to select an asset to use

tooltip.title: Open Browser
tooltip.content: Launches a browser to allow user to select an asset to use

tooltip.title: Assigns selected
tooltip.content: Assigns the selected item from the asset browser

tooltip.title: Open Asset Editor
tooltip.content: Launches the Material Editor to edit the assigned asset

tooltip.title: Tessellation
tooltip.content: If hardware supports, tessellate particles for better shadowing and curved connected particles

tooltip.title: Octagonal Shape
tooltip.content: Use octagonal shape for textures instead of quad

tooltip.title: Soft Particle
tooltip.content: Soft intersection with background

tooltip.title: Geometry
tooltip.content: Geometry for 3D particles

tooltip.title: Open Browser
tooltip.content: Launches a browser to allow user to select an asset to use

tooltip.title: Geometry Pieces
tooltip.content: Which geometry pieces to emit.
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when there is no geometry assigned.

tooltip.title: No Offset
tooltip.content: Disable centering of geometry
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when there is no geometry assigned

tooltip.title: Alpha
tooltip.content: Alpha value (opacity, or multiplier for additive)

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.title: Emitter Strength
tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.title: Particle Age
tooltip.content: Value variance with particle age

tooltip.title: Alpha Clip
tooltip.content: Alpha clipping settings, for particle alpha 0 to 1

tooltip.title: Scale
tooltip.content: Alpha multiplier for particle alpha 0 to 1

tooltip.title: Source Min
tooltip.content: Source alpha clip min, for particle alpha 0 to 1

tooltip.title: Source Width
tooltip.content: Source alpha clip range, for particle alpha 0 to 1

tooltip.title: Color
tooltip.content: Color modulation - RMB click color value for more options

tooltip.title: Alpha
tooltip.content: Alpha setting 0 - 10

tooltip.title: Random
tooltip.content: Random variation, fraction range = [1-Random,1].

tooltip.content: Value variance with emitter Strength, or emitter age if Strength < 0
tooltip.disabled_content: Disabled when Emitter Lifetime is set to 0.

tooltip.content: Value variance with particle age

tooltip.title: Motion Blur
tooltip.content: Simulate motion blur on particles

tooltip.title: Blur Strength
tooltip.content: Multiplier for blur effect

tooltip.title: Diffuse Lighting
tooltip.content: Multiplier for particle dynamic lighting

tooltip.title: Diffuse Backlighting
tooltip.content: Fraction of diffuse lighting applied in all directions

tooltip.title: Emissive Lighting
tooltip.content: Multiplier for particle emissive lighting

tooltip.title: Environment Probe Lighting
tooltip.content: Amount of diffuse lighting contribution from environment probes.

tooltip.title: Receive Shadows
tooltip.content: Shadows will cast on these particles

tooltip.title: Cast Shadows
tooltip.content: Particles will cast shadows from the sun. (GPU particles and CPU geom particles only)

tooltip.title: Not Affected By Fog
tooltip.content: Ignore fog

tooltip.title: Global Illumination
tooltip.content: Enable global illumination in the shader

tooltip.title: Light Source
tooltip.content: Per-particle light generation

tooltip.title: Radius
tooltip.content: Radius of light

tooltip.title: Physics Type

tooltip.title: Collide Terrain
tooltip.content: Particles collide with terrain

tooltip.title: Collide Static Objects
tooltip.content: Particles collide with static objects

tooltip.title: Collide Dynamic Objects
tooltip.content: Particles collide with dynamic objects

tooltip.title: Collision Fraction
tooltip.content: Fraction of emitted particles that actually perform collisions

tooltip.title: Collision Cutoff Distance
tooltip.content: Maximum distance up until collisions are respected (0 = infinite)

tooltip.title: Max Collision Events
tooltip.content: Max # collision events per particle (0 = no limit)

tooltip.title: Surface Type
tooltip.content: Surface type for physicalized particles

tooltip.title: Die On Collide
tooltip.content: Particle behavior when colliding with geometry

tooltip.title: Use Self Collision
tooltip.content: Use collision against particles of the same emitter for die/stop behavior

tooltip.name: Collision.Collision_Layer
tooltip.title: Collision Layer
tooltip.content: Collision layer for particles bodies

tooltip.name: Collision.Collision_Group
tooltip.title: Collides With
tooltip.content: Collision group for particles to collide with

tooltip.title: Elasticity
tooltip.content: Collision bounce coefficient: 0 = no bounce, 1 = full bounce, <0 = die

tooltip.title: Dynamic Friction
tooltip.content: Sliding drag value, in inverse seconds

tooltip.title: Thickness
tooltip.content: Used for projection depth for Decal particle type. And simulates thickness for physicalized particles.

tooltip.title: Density
tooltip.content: Mass density for physicslized particles

tooltip.title: Camera Non Facing Fade
tooltip.content: If the particle is close to orthagonal to the camera it will be faded out.

tooltip.title: View Distance Adjust
tooltip.content: Multiplier to automatic distance fade-out

tooltip.title: Fade Strength at Min Distance
tooltip.content: Exponential power applied during the fade transition at Camera Min Distance

tooltip.title: Fade Strength at Max Distance
tooltip.content: Exponential power applied during the fade transition at Camera Max Distance

tooltip.title: Camera Max Distance
tooltip.content: Max distance from camera to render particles

tooltip.title: Camera Min Distance
tooltip.content: Min distance from camera to render particles

tooltip.title: Camera Distance Offset
tooltip.content: Offset the emitter away from the camera

tooltip.title: Sort Offset
tooltip.content: Offset distance used for sorting

tooltip.title: Sort Bounds Scale
tooltip.content: Specify point in emitter for sorting; 1 = bounds nearest, 0 = origin, -1 = bounds farthest

tooltip.title: Dynamic Culling
tooltip.content: Force enable Dynamic Culling. This disables culling of particle simulation to get accurate bounds for render culling.

tooltip.title: Draw Near
tooltip.content: Render particle in near space (weapon)

tooltip.title: Draw On Top
tooltip.content: Render particle on top of everything (no depth test)

tooltip.title: Visible Indoors
tooltip.content: Whether visible indoors / outdoors / both

tooltip.title: Visible Underwater
tooltip.content: Whether visible under / above water / both

tooltip.title: Force Generation
tooltip.content: Generate physical forces if set

tooltip.title: Fill Rate Cost
tooltip.content: Adjustment to max screen fill allowed per emitter

tooltip.title: Spherical Volume
tooltip.content: Simulates adding spherical volume to the particle and multiplies particle size to define the volume

tooltip.title: Heat Scale
tooltip.content: Multiplier to thermal vision

tooltip.title: Sort Quality
tooltip.content: Sort new particles as accurately as possible into list, by main camera distance

tooltip.title: Half Res
tooltip.content: Use half resolution rendering

tooltip.title: Streamable
tooltip.content: Texture/geometry allowed to be streamed

tooltip.title: Depth of Field Blur
tooltip.content: Particles will be blurred against depth of field fullscreen effect. (excluding geometry and decal types)

tooltip.title: Fog Volume Shading Quality
tooltip.content: Particle fog volume shading quality, fog volumes are handled more accurately.

tooltip.title: Config Min
tooltip.content: Minimum config spec this effect runs in

tooltip.title: Config Max
tooltip.content: Maximum config spec this effect runs in

tooltip.title: Platforms
tooltip.content: Platforms this effect runs on

tooltip.title: Level of Detail Blend in value
Level of Detail Blend out value
